title: #BlackMarket - Gratitude Botanical Farms #Blackexcellencespotlight with Karlous Miller!
itunes:title: #BlackMarket - Gratitude Botanical Farms #Blackexcellencespotlight with Karlous Miller!
description:
We searched through the community and are sharing the spotlight with the master gardeners from Gratitude Botanical Farms!


Gratitude Botanical Farm’s mission is to educate, grow, feed, serve and protect the history of the people of Atlanta through the art of organic urban agriculture.


They are comprised of Christopher Lemons and Desmond Baskerville, both Atlanta natives. Not only are they business partners, but also childhood friends. Christopher, a certified master gardener from a long lineage of farmers in Georgia, maintained and managed his community garden for years in the historic Peoplestown community in Atlanta. Desmond, also an ancestral farmer, often volunteered there as his love for agriculture grew into a passion. In 2018 they were presented with the opportunity to work their dreams into a reality. Learn more about what they got goin on and hit their website for more info!



https://www.gratitudeatl.com/home



Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...



FOLLOW THE CREW


KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/

DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
